id.description: The unique identifier of the campaign.

ad_account_id.description: The unique identifier of the ad account associated with the campaign.

status.description: The current status of the campaign.

lifetime_spend_cap.description: The maximum amount that can be spent for the lifetime of the campaign.

daily_spend_cap.description: The maximum amount that can be spent daily on the campaign.

order_line_id.description: The unique identifier of the order line associated with the campaign.

tracking_urls.description: List of tracking URLs associated with the campaign

buyable_button.description: Tracking URLs for buyable button events.

audience_verification.description: Tracking URLs for audience verification events.

objective_type.description: The type of the campaign objective.

created_time.description: The timestamp indicating when the campaign was created.

updated_time.description: The timestamp indicating when the campaign was last updated.

start_time.description: The timestamp indicating the start time of the campaign.

end_time.description: The timestamp indicating the end time of the campaign.

summary_status.description: The summary status of the campaign.

is_campaign_budget_optimization.description: Indicates if campaign budget optimization is enabled.

is_flexible_daily_budgets.description: Indicates if flexible daily budgets are enabled for the campaign.
